Name: [Affinity] Hostile Wake-Over
Desc: Ellen has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Arctic Ocean Predator]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo. Additionally, she gains the <color=#FFAF2C>Rest Longer To Work Better</color> effect (Effective for {CReplaceCardParam:BattleCount_Card1100953,1,2} more battles).
Desc2: The bad news is that Ellen did not get a good night's sleep. The good news is that she's now refreshed and eager to clear any obstacles for the next night's quality sleep.
